| HistoryText             = The Sorcerers' Triad aka Pantheon of Sorcerers performed a magic ritual to enable the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]] to understand their language and awake Bruce Banner's mind in his own body{{r|Incredible Hulk Vol 1 140}}. 

When the Hulk was turned against the people of  K'ai by the [[Psyklop (Earth-616)|Psyklop]], they freed his mind using a spell.{{r|Incredible Hulk Vol 1 203}}
